overview:
In 2003, Mr. Weiland co-founded and served as CEO of The Work Institute, a company that provides research, information technology and organizational tools for the management of human capital. The North Central Division of Gambro Healthcare was a client of the firm. In 2000, Mr. Weiland co-founded and served as Chief Operating Officer of Cleartrack Information Network, a provider of information, workflow and measurement tools for supply chain management.

Mr. Weiland previously was executive vice president at MEDSTAT and the general manager of its Inforum division, and held senior positions at Aladdin Industries, Coventry Corporation, Caremark International and Baxter.
